languages.text: На складочных палубах разверзся варп-разрыв, сквозь который явилась целая стая демонов — тварей причудливых форм и видов, но все одинаково кровожадные и жестокие. Команда трепещет в ужасе, уповая на мудрость Лорд-капитана!

A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!
languages.original_text: На складочных палубах разверзся варп-разрыв, сквозь который явилась целая стая демонов — тварей причудливых форм и видов, но все одинаково кровожадные и жестокие. Команда трепещет в ужасе, уповая на мудрость Лорд-капитана!

traits.locale_text: A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemon has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

languages.text: 储藏甲板上出现了亚空间的裂缝，一群恶魔冲了出来。这群怪物的外形与种类千奇百怪，但他们的嗜血与残暴却如出一辙。船员们惊恐万分，祈祷领主舰长依靠智慧拯救他们！
languages.original_text: A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

traits.locale_text: 储藏甲板上出现了亚空间的裂缝，一群恶魔冲了出来。这群怪物的外形与种类千奇百怪，但他们的嗜血与残暴却如出一辙。船员们惊恐万分，祈祷领主舰长依靠智慧拯救他们！

languages.text: Un agujero de la disformidad se ha abierto en las cubiertas de carga y ha aparecido una horda de demonios. Criaturas de formas y variedades extrañas, pero todas igual de sanguinarias y brutales. ¡La tripulación está aterrorizada y reza por la sabiduría {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán!
languages.original_text: A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

traits.locale_text: Un agujero de la disformidad se ha abierto en las cubiertas de carga y ha aparecido una horda de demonios. Criaturas de formas y variedades extrañas, pero todas igual de sanguinarias y brutales. ¡La tripulación está aterrorizada y reza por la sabiduría {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán!

languages.text: 倉庫デッキに<歪み>の裂け目が出現して、ディーモンの群れがドバッと中から現れた。異様な姿や種類のクリーチャー達は、みんな同様に血に飢えて残忍だ。クルーは恐怖に飲まれて、ロード・キャプテンの知恵を祈り求めている！
languages.original_text: A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

traits.locale_text: 倉庫デッキに<歪み>の裂け目が出現して、ディーモンの群れがドバッと中から現れた。異様な姿や種類のクリーチャー達は、みんな同様に血に飢えて残忍だ。クルーは恐怖に飲まれて、ロード・キャプテンの知恵を祈り求めている！

languages.text: Une déchirure béante du Warp s'ouvre sur les ponts de stockage et y vomit une horde de démons, des créatures aussi variées que difformes, mais toutes aussi brutales et assoiffées de sang les unes que les autres. La terreur s'empare de tout l'équipage, qui implore {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de les guider par sa sagesse.
languages.original_text: A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

traits.locale_text: Une déchirure béante du Warp s'ouvre sur les ponts de stockage et y vomit une horde de démons, des créatures aussi variées que difformes, mais toutes aussi brutales et assoiffées de sang les unes que les autres. La terreur s'empare de tout l'équipage, qui implore {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de les guider par sa sagesse.

languages.text: Ein Warpriss hat sich auf den Lagerdecks geöffnet, und ein ganzes Rudel Dämonen ist hindurchgekommen — Kreaturen von unterschiedlichster Gestalt, die aber alle gleichermaßen blutrünstig und brutal sind. Die Crew ist völlig verängstigt und betet, dass die Weisheit des Lord Captains sie aus dieser Lage befreit!
languages.original_text: A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!

traits.locale_text: Ein Warpriss hat sich auf den Lagerdecks geöffnet, und ein ganzes Rudel Dämonen ist hindurchgekommen — Kreaturen von unterschiedlichster Gestalt, die aber alle gleichermaßen blutrünstig und brutal sind. Die Crew ist völlig verängstigt und betet, dass die Weisheit des Lord Captains sie aus dieser Lage befreit!

languages.text: Depo güvertelerinde bir öteboyut yırtığı meydana geldi ve bir grup iblis ortaya fırladı. Bu garip şekil ve çeşitlerdeki yaratıkların hepsi aynı derecede kana susamış ve vahşi. Mürettebat korkuya kapılmış durumda, Lord Kaptan'ın hikmetine dua ediyorlar!
languages.original_text: A warp tear has split open on the storage decks, and a whole pack of daemons has burst through — creatures of odd forms and varieties, but all of them equally bloodthirsty and brutal. The crew is struck with terror, praying for the Lord Captain's wisdom!
